title: Commencement Certificate beyond 75 % of the admissible BUA shall not be issued unless the infrastructure development in the entire layout and construction of AH tenements/Amenities is completed& occupation is granted
clause_text: Commencement Certificate beyond 75 % of the admissible BUA shall not be issued unless the infrastructure development in the entire layout and construction of AH tenements/Amenities is completed& occupation is granted.
section: Compensation for development of infrastructure in lands handed over to MCGM and constructed BUA.
